item.title: Rules for Kali Linux facebook group
item.description:
1. Stay Focused on Learning & Skill Development:

This group is a knowledge hub for ethical hacking, cybersecurity, and Kali Linux. âœ… Ask questions, share knowledge, and help each other grow! âœ… All posts must be relevant to these topics. ðŸš« Basic Kali errors? Ask in the Community Chat, not as a post. ðŸ’¡ Tip: Search before asking! Many common issues are already discussed.

Weâ€™re here to learn, not to clutter the group with unnecessary posts.
